CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Detect biking activity
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically detect when biking. This has a small impact on battery life.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Record biking locations
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: By storing high-precision location data during bike rides the app can automatically learn more about your typical destinations and hence improve predictions.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Continuously record locations
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Recording low-precision location data through-out the day helps give some context to certain locations, such as home and work. This has a small impact on battery life.
